text: An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 is good, but I expected a bit more from the fan noise on the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" Full HD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 5 R5-3550H, GeForce GTX 1660 Ti, 8 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DU-MB53. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" Full HD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 5 R5-3550H, GeForce GTX 1660 Ti, 8 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DU-MB53!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" Full HD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 5 R5-3550H, GeForce GTX 1660 Ti, 8 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DU-MB53 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" Full HD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 5 R5-3550H, GeForce GTX 1660 Ti, 8 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DU-MB53!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the ASUS TUF Gaming Laptop, 15.6" Full HD IPS-Type, AMD Ryzen 5 R5-3550H, GeForce GTX 1660 Ti, 8 GB DDR4, 512 GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit Wi-Fi 5, Windows 10 Home, FX505DU-MB53 is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
